title: NodeJS Assignment
description: Switch to NodeJS to create a server side application.

title: Build File Database
description: Experiment with navigating the file system in R.

title: Build Conceptual & Logical Data Models
description: Express the data model in a UML Class Diagram

title: Normalize a Schema
description: Normalize a relational schema into at least Third Normal Form (3NF)

title: Sorting Algorithms Analysis
description: Implement and analyze various sorting algorithms such as Bubble Sort, QuickSort, and Merge Sort.

title: Dynamic Programming - Knapsack Problem:
description: Solve the 0/1 Knapsack problem using dynamic programming.

title: Graph Algorithms - Shortest Path
description: Implement algorithms for finding the shortest path in a graph, such as Dijkstra's and Bellman-Ford.
